abstract: Amazon.com and the book publisher Macmillan finally settled their weeklong dispute, restoring Macmillan books to the site.
snippet: Amazon.com and the book publisher Macmillan finally settled their weeklong dispute, restoring Macmillan books to the site.
lead_paragraph: Electronic and paper books from the publisher Macmillan were returning to Amazon.com on Friday evening, ending a weeklong public conflict as the parties negotiated over the future price of e-books.

headline.main: Macmillan Books Return to Amazon After Dispute

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Motoko Rich
